package collection;

import java.util.ArrayDeque;
import java.util.Deque;
import java.util.Iterator;
import java.util.LinkedList;
import java.util.PriorityQueue;
import java.util.Queue;

public class QueueDemo {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//Linked List
		Queue<Integer> q = new LinkedList<Integer>();
		
		//add elements
		for(int i =0 ;i<5;i++)
		{
			q.add(i);
		}
		
		System.out.println("Content of q :" + q);
		
		//remove the head
		int removehead = q.remove();
		System.out.println("Content of q after head removal : " + removehead);
		
		int removehead1 = q.remove();
		System.out.println("Content of q after head removal : " + removehead1);
	/*The peek() method returns the object at the top of the 
	  current queue, without removing it. If the queue is empty 
	  this method returns null.
	  The poll() method of the Queue interface returns the object 
	  at the top of the current queue and removes it. 
	  If the queue is empty this method returns null.
	 */
		System.out.println("\n content of queue : " + q);
		System.out.println("\n head of queue : " + q.peek());
		System.out.println("\n content of queue : " + q.size());
		
		//poll method (Return and remove the head of the queue)
		System.out.println("\n poll method : " + q.poll());
		System.out.println("\n content of q : " + q);
		
		
		Queue<String> q1 = new PriorityQueue<String>();
		q1.add("Element 1");
		q1.add("Element 2");
		q1.add("Element 3");
		q1.offer("Element 4");
		
		System.out.println("Content of q1 : " + q1.peek());
		System.out.println("Content of q1 : " + q1.poll());
		System.out.println("Content of q1 : " + q1.peek());
		
		Iterator i = q1.iterator();
		while(i.hasNext())
		{
			System.out.println("\n" + i.next());
			
			
		}
		
		Queue<Book> book = new LinkedList<Book>();
		Book b1 = new Book(101, "Java Programming", "Rajukumar buyya");
		Book b2 = new Book(102, "Android Programming","Wei Ming Li");
		
		book.add(b1);
		book.offer(b2);
		
		Iterator i1 = book.iterator();
		while(i1.hasNext())
		{
			Book b3 = (Book)i1.next();
			System.out.println("Content of book");
			System.out.println(b3.id + "," + b3.title + "," + b3.Author);
		}
		book.remove();
		for(Book b : book)
		{
			System.out.println(b.id + "," + b.title + "," + b.Author);
		}
		
		Deque<String> deque = new ArrayDeque<String>();
		deque.add("Element 1");
		deque.addFirst("Element 2");
		deque.addLast("Element 3");
		System.out.println(deque);
	}

	
}

class Book
{
	int id;
	String title, Author;
	
	Book(int ID, String title, String author)
	{
		this.id = ID;
		this.title = title;
		this.Author = author;
	}
}
